Test Name: Platelet Function Defect Gene Panel, Next-Generation Sequencing
Purpose: To detect and characterize genetic variants associated with platelet function defects using next-generation sequencing.
Container: EDTA or ACD blood collection tube
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, spectrophotometer/fluorometer, NGS library preparation kit, thermocycler, Next-Generation Sequencer (e.g., Illumina MiSeq), bioinformatics software
